body.MessageBody2: This is an email notification generated from Azure Data Factory for Clorox Internal Dimension ingestion.
body.MessageBody3: Please find below the pipeline execution details:

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select Source_count as Source_Count, Target_Count from dbo.etl_audit_log where batch_id = (select max(batch_id)
from dbo.etl_audit_log) and Activity_Name = 'SPRC_Internal_Dim_Customer'

activities.name: Check for Src to Tgt match
